p: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) has conducted hospital-based surveillance of severe influenza since the pandemic in 2009 [ 19]. Aggregate data are published weekly during the influenza season [ 6], but case-based data have not been systematically analyzed at the European level [ 20, 21]. Therefore, our aim was to analyze data on laboratory-confirmed influenza cases admitted to ICUs to identify common determinants of fatal outcome that may inform risk communication and help target prevention strategies.
